docs.lead_paragraph: As Democrats and Republicans consider what kind of “change” voters are looking for now, they can start with the idea that federal and state governments need to protect citizens’ rights.

docs.lead_paragraph: Two insiders had said Kyphon, a unit of Medtronic, improperly persuaded hospitals to keep people overnight for a simple outpatient procedure to repair small fissures of the spine.

headline.main: Medtronic Settles a Civil Lawsuit on Allegations of Medicare Fraud

docs.lead_paragraph: In another blow to the embattled American International Group, a Florida pension fund accused the insurance giant and a number of its top executives on Wednesday of understating the company's exposure to the subprime mortgage crisis in order to inflate its stock price artificially.

headline.main: Florida Pension Fund Is Suing A.I.G.

docs.abstract: In another blow to the embattled American International Group, a Florida pension fund accused the insurance giant and a number of its top executives on Wednesday of understating the company's exposure to the subprime mortgage crisis in order to inflate its stock price artificially.
